objective.body: To obtain a job within my chosen field that will challenge me and allow me to use my education, skills and past experiences in a way that is mutually beneficial to both myself and my employer and allow for future growth and advancement.
objective.heading: Objective

items.summary: This app will use a smartphone camera to deploy digital AR content over the textbooks using Target-based AR tracking of Vuforia SDK. This digital content will contain, concept related videos, and 3D models of the topics. The main aim of this app to make learning more interactive and easy to understand fundamental concepts.
items.title: Interactive Learning with Augmented Reality (AR) - Mobile App

items.summary: PUBG Companion - Guide for Battlegrounds had been one of the most popular apps on Google Play with over 30k+ daily users and been reviewed among the 'Best Android App in August 2018' by many Tech YouTubers, while the (Pro) version of the app has been listed among the 'Top 10' paid apps in Books and Reference category on Google Play. App's Frontend has elegant material UI with Backend completely powered by Firebase Realtime Database.
items.title: PUBG Companion - Android App

items.summary: WallPicks - UHD and 4K wallpapers, Lightweight app with Material design dashboard with Beautiful animations having a collection of 1000+ Exclusive handpicked wallpaper that you can’t find anywhere else and new wallpapers being added every day. The app featured  'Ads free' smooth UI experience with a Light and Dark theme.
items.title: WallPicks - Android App

items.summary:
- Developed & Deployed several Native and Cross-Platform apps using Android and Flutter for the clients.
- Created an Ecommerce app for Shopify Stores using GraphQL API on Flutter.
- Gained experience in working with technologies such as Flutter, JavaScript, Dart, Kotlin, React Native, and NodeJs.
‎
Despite being a remote internship because of COVID-19, it was a wonderful experience!
**Sallah.app:** https://apps.apple.com/us/app/sallah-app/id1518449852

- Developed the Job Fair Portal for FICCI ENCOURAGE Virtual Mega Internship Placement Drive - 2020
- Implemented features like Live Chat, Customer Support Ticketing System, and Live Results Visualizer using PHP and Google Sheets API.
- Gained practical exposure to technologies such as WordPress, CSS, PHP, VPS Server. 
**GBUJOBS:** https://gbujobs.com.

- Developed the BluSmart Charging app using (OCPP) - Open Charge Point Protocol, it's an application protocol for communication between Electric Vehicle (EV) charging stations and a central management system (CMS), also known as the charging station network. The central management system server was developed with the ability to operate the installed smart chargers.
-  The app was designed to communicate with the CMS and perform the transactions on the smart chargers and enabled real-time tracking of charging status of Electric Vehicle (EV) on the user's smartphone
- Implemented Scan QR code from the app placed on the smart chargers to remotely start charging and other features like navigation to nearby smart charging stations through Google Maps APIs
- Gained experience in working with Restful APIs and various other APIs/SDK such as Google Maps API, MapmyIndia, Firebase, and OneSignal.
**BluSmart Charge:** https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blusmart.charging
